page.title: 03PEOPLE AND THE AREA
page.content: BROTHERTOFT IS NOT A VILLAGE AS SUCH,THE POPULATION IS SPREAD OUT IN A WIDE AREA.THERE IS NO CENTREL POINT TO THE VILLAGE LIKE A POST OFFICE,CHURCH OR PUBLIC HOUSE WHICH IS THE NORMAL CASE.IT IS A FARMING COMMUNITY WITH A FEW PRIVATE HOUSE'S.THERE ARE A FEW TIDE HOUSE'S IN THE AREA,A TIDE HOUSE MEAN'S THAT TO LIVE IN THE HOUSE YOU HAVE TO WORK ON THE FARM.THE POPULATION OF BROTHERTOFT IS BETWEEN 350-400 PEOPLE IT IS FRIENDLY COMMUNITY AND THE WORKER'S HAVE BROAD LINCOLNSHIRE DIALECT.THE INTEREST'S PEOPLE HAVE IN THIS AREA ARE FISHING AND SHOOTING GAME.THE GAME THEY SHOOT ARE PHEASANTS,PARTRIDGE AND RABBIT'S.THEY USE THE LOCAL RIVER WITHAM FOR FISHING WHICH IS VERY POPULAR THE FISH THEY CATCH ARE PERCH,BREAM,TENCH,PIKE AND ELL'S.
